channel.title: Announcements from Web Services
channel.description: List of announcements for GU-managed WordPress sites.

item.title: Commencement Change Moratorium
item.description: Due to a UIS-wide hold on changes during finals/commencement, we will not be able to push new features or launch sites between May 1 and May 20 except in an emergency.

item.title: Starting in March: office hours every Tuesday!
item.description: Web Services is now hosting our WordPress-specific office hours every Tuesday, 2:30-3:30pm! Sign up for an appointment slot here (in the Description field, add a few things you want to chat about). Every other week the location will be Car Barn 101, and the other weeks the location will be on Zoom (the appointment slot you sign up for will indicate the location). We’ll be on hand to chat about migration, accessibility, layouts, or anything else you'd like to discuss regarding your Georgetown WordPress website. See you there!

item.title: March and April trainings are now live!
item.description: To sign up, look for an email from us with the subject line “Sign up for WordPress training.” The email will have dates and links to sign up for training. If you didn’t receive our email and you’re working on a migration (or will soon be working on a migration), let us know.

item.title: Getting help with WordPress
item.description: Getting started with our WordPress platform at Georgetown? Or have a specific question? Take a look at our documentation site for best practices and editing help.

item.title: Report an issue with our WordPress platform!
item.description: Have you encountered an issue while working on your site? Fill out our Google Form and we'll investigate.
